short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select phone numbers and right click to call

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Click to call phone numbers or Select and Right Click to Call on most webpages. Optional Confirm Call Option.

TERMS and PRIVACY POLICY

By using this Chrome Extension, you agree to CloudPBX and Precision Computer Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy

DATA & COOKIE USE DISCLOSURE: 

In addition to data use information mentioned in our privacy policy, this extension reads your CLoudPBX cookies to ensure that you logged in your PBX Account.

CHROME PERMISSION USAGE DISCLOSURE: 
This chrome extension requires following permissions from your Chrome browser: 

 1. contextMenus: Used to give you an open to right click and select any phone number to make calls.
 2. storage: Used to save your cookie in local storage so that we don't request cookies every time.
 3. cookies: Used to read your CloudPBX Login cookies

DISCLAIMER:
This extension uses Google Analytics to collect extension usage statistics to help improve user experience. If you want to opt-out of Google Analytics tracking, please visit http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout or you can set up a filter in Adblock Plus or similar ad blocker tools like AdBlock, uBlock or Adblock Pro.

================================================

ABOUT THIS EXTENSION

CloudPBX Chrome Extension is designed for CloudPBX.cc account. It allows you to click to call/select to call on most websites, beside just valid phone numbers in your CRM. 

Requirement: This extension requires CloudPBX.CC Paid Account.
